Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation, the Orlando Sentinel reported. Planned Parenthood of Central Florida is under investigation by the state attorney general's office for allegedly distributing fetal tissue to Planned Parenthood clinics in violation of the federal Employee Polygraph Protection Act, the Sentinel reported. The foundation's funding of Planned Parenthood clinics in Florida has been cut by more than $1 million, the Sentinel reported. The foundation's funding of Planned Parenthood clinics in Georgia has also been cut, the Sentinel reported.

column1: English: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring. = French: Les scientifiques ont soupçonné Encelade d’être géologiquement actif et d’être une source possible de l’anneau E glacé de Saturne. ### English: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed. = French:

column3: The icy moon Enceladus may be a geologically active world, and a possible source of Saturn's E ring, scientists say. The ring is made up of ice particles ejected from the moon's south pole, and scientists suspect that Enceladus' geysers are spewing out the material. The ring is visible in Cassini's images of the moon, and scientists believe it could be a "solar wind farm," a source of energy for the ring, the European Space Agency says. The ring is also a possible source of methane, which could explain why Enceladus has a thick atmosphere, the agency says. Scientists have long suspected that Enceladus is geologically active, and that it could be a source of the ring, the European Space Agency says. The ring is visible in Cassini's images of the moon, and scientists believe it could be a "solar wind farm," a source of energy for the ring, the agency says.

column1: English: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries. = French: Selon les chercheurs principaux, cela pourrait permettre une détection précoce du cancer, de la tuberculose, du VIH et du paludisme chez les patients des pays à faible revenu, où le taux de survie à des maladies telles que le cancer du sein peut être deux fois moins élevé que dans les pays riches. ### English: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. = French:

column3: Early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria could be possible in low-income countries through a simple blood test, say scientists. The lead researchers say this could bring early detection to patients in countries where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries. The test, which is based on a simple dipstick test, is cheap and easy to perform, and could be used in remote areas, the researchers say. "This is a very exciting development," says lead researcher Dr. David Agus, of the University of California San Francisco. "It's a test that can be done in a doctor's office, and it can be done in a patient's home." The test is based on a simple dipstick test. The test is cheap and easy to perform, and could be used in remote areas, the researchers say. column1: English: That means everything has to be put back," said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw. = French: « Cela veut dire que tout doit être remis en place », a déclaré Berhane Asfaw, chercheur au Rift Valley Research Service en Éthiopie et co-auteur de l'étude. ### English: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. = French:

column3: The discovery of a planet outside our solar system could help scientists better understand the formation of stars, planets, and ultimately life, a new study suggests. The planet, called HD 189733, was found orbiting a star called HD 189733, which is about 2,000 light-years away in the constellation Pisces. "This is the first time we have found a planet outside our solar system," study co-author Berhane Asfaw of the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia tells Space.com. "It's a very exciting discovery." The planet is unusual in that it has a large amount of methane, a gas that forms when hydrogen atoms rearrange to become larger ions. Methane is a key ingredient for life on Earth, and it's produced in the planet's atmosphere. The discovery could help scientists better understand how planets form and evolve. "This is the first time we have found a planet outside our solar system," says Asfaw. "It's a very exciting discovery." The study was published in the journal Nature.

column1: English: That means everything has to be put back," said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw. = French: « Cela veut dire que tout doit être remis en place », a déclaré Berhane Asfaw, chercheur au Rift Valley Research Service en Éthiopie et co-auteur de l'étude. ### English: The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others. = French:
column2: Le secret de leur réussite est le concept de niche, une tâche spéciale dévolue à chaque félin, l'empêchant d'entrer en compétition avec les autres.
column3: The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others, according to a new study. Researchers from the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study say that a cat's ability to adapt to its environment is the key to its success. "If you look at the niche concept, it's the ability to adapt to a changing environment," says Berhane Asfaw, a researcher at the service and co-author of the study. "If you look at the niche concept, it's the ability to adapt to a changing environment." The researchers studied a population of servals in Ethiopia and found that each cat has a specific job, such as hunting, guarding, or catching mice. "Every cat has a niche," says Asfaw. "It's a special job that each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others." The study, published in the journal Ecology Letters, found that the cats have a hard time adjusting to changes in their environment. "They are very good at adapting to new situations," says Asf

column3: The International Olympic Committee has voted to admit golf and rugby union to the 2016 Olympics in Rio de Janeiro. The sports were selected over five other sports at the IOC's executive board meeting in Berlin today, the AFP reports. The committee voted to admit the sports after a presentation from the International Rugby Board, which argued that the sports had "great potential for the future of the Olympic Games." The IRB argued that the sports had "great potential for the future of the Olympic Games" and that they would "significantly benefit" from the Olympics. The IOC president, Thomas Bach, said the sports had been chosen because they were "very popular" and "have a great potential for the future of the Olympic Games." The sports will be considered for inclusion in the 2016 Games after the IOC's executive board meeting in Tokyo in August.

The H5N1 strain of bird flu is lethal to humans, and the dead bird was found in marshland near Lyon in eastern France, the minister said. The bird was found Monday, and tests showed it had the H5N1 strain, the minister said. The ministry did not say how the bird died. The H5N1 strain has been found in wild birds in China, Japan, South Korea, and Vietnam, and in captive birds in the United States, the World Organization for Animal Health said in a statement. The virus has been found in pigeons in China, and in a wild bird in Vietnam, the statement said.

column1: English: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam. = French: D'après les locataires de Lockwood Gardens, il pourrait y avoir 40 autres familles voire même plus rdiquant l'expulsion. Ils ont en effet appris que la police d'OHA enquêtait également sur d'autres logements publics de la ville d'Oakland, qui pourraient eux aussi être impliqués dans des arnaques au logement. ### English: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason. = French:

column3: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens, the first of several public housing properties in Oakland to be evicted in a scam targeting public housing residents, believe that there may be 40 more families or more facing eviction. They learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the scam. "It's a scam," said one tenant. "It's a big scam." The tenants say they were told that the scam involved a contractor who would overcharge them for work that never happened. The contractor would then evict them and pocket the difference. The tenants say they were told that the contractor had been arrested and that the scam was being investigated. The tenants say they were never told that they would be evicted. The scam was first exposed in March, when the Oakland Housing Authority evicted dozens of families from Lockwood Gardens. The tenants say they were told that the contractor had been arrested and that the scam was being investigated.

column2: Il n'y a pas vraiment de saisons « pluvieuses » et « sèches » : les précipitations sont à peu près constantes tout au long de l'année.
column3: The United States embassy in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.

column1: English: It can be customized to make it easy to read and also with as much or little color as desired. = French: Elle peut être personnalisée afin d'en faciliter la lecture, et l'on peut y mettre autant ou aussi peu de couleur que l'on souhaite. ### English: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia. = French:
column2: Après sept jours de défaites électorales aux élections de mi-mandat, Bush a fait part de son projet d'élargir le commerce en Asie.
column3: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

column1: English: For a few pennies some children will tell you the story. = French: Pour quelques pièces de monnaie, des enfants vous raconteront l’histoire. ### English: Sadly, as newer methods of writing have emerged, the pencil has been relegated to lesser status and uses. = French:
column2: Malheureusement, l'apparition de nouveaux modes de rédaction a relégué le stylo à un statut plus confidentiel et à des utilisations plus rares.
column3: As newer methods of writing have emerged, the pencil has been relegated to lesser status and uses.

column1: English: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. = French: Les scientifiques ont découvert des reliefs parsemés sur toute la surface de la lune, appelés escarpements lobés, qui résulteraient apparemment du fait que la lune rétrécisse progressivement. ### English: Accepted were Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology. = French:
column2: Les opinions d'Aristote sur toutes les questions scientifiques, y compris la psychologie, ont été acceptées.
column3: Aristotle's views on all matters of science, including psychology, were accepted.

column1: English: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. = French: Stardust établira un nouveau record historique pour être le vaisseau spatial le plus rapide à revenir sur Terre, battant le précédent record établi en mai 1969 lors du retour du module de commande d'Apollo X. ### English: Content theories are centered on finding what makes people tick or appeals to them. = French:
column2: Les théories du contenu sont centrées sur la recherche de ce qui fait que les gens se sentent bien ou qu'ils sont attirés.
column3: spacecraft

column1: English: The temple of Artemis at Ephesus was destroyed on July 21, 356 BCE in an act of arson committed by Herostratus. = French: Le temple d'Artémis à Ephèse a été détruit le 21 juillet 356 avant J.-C. lors d'un incendie criminel commis par Herostratus. ### English: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive. = French:
column2: Nous fabriquons nos maisons et nos vêtements à base de plantes. La plupart des aliments que nous mangeons sont des plantes. Sans les plantes, les animaux ne survivraient pas.
column3: Without plants, animals could not survive.

column1: English: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. = French: Le cyclone Felicia, après avoir atteint le niveau 4 sur l'échelle de Saffir-Simpson, s'est transformé en dépression tropicale avant de se dissiper mardi. ### English: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia. = French:
column2: Le dernier match du championnat aura lieu à l’Ellis Park de Johannesburg la semaine prochaine, lorsque les Springboks affronteront l’Australie.
column3: South Africa's Springboks will face Australia in the final Test of the series at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next Saturday.

column1: English: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. = French: Les variantes du français pratiquées en Belgique et en Suisse diffèrent légèrement du français parlé en France, bien qu'elles soient suffisamment similaires pour être mutuellement intelligibles. ### English: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up. = French:
column2: L'une des méthodes les plus courantes utilisées pour illustrer l'importance de la socialisation est de s'inspirer des quelques cas malheureux d'enfants qui, par négligence, malheur ou abus volontaire, n'ont pas été socialisés par des adultes pendant leur enfance.
column3: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.

column1: English: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. = French: La semaine passée, Naked News a annoncé son intention d'augmenter sérieusement le nombre d'heures dédiées au journal en langue internationale, avec trois nouveaux programmes à la clé. ### English: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification. = French:
column2: L’argent pourrait être reversé dans la construction de maisons résistantes aux inondations, dans une meilleure gestion de l’eau et dans la diversification des cultures.
column3: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts.

column1: English: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing. = French: Néanmoins, il existe de nombreuses façons de boire le café dans le monde entier qui valent la peine d'être expérimentées. ### English: Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. = French:
column2: L'argent peut être échangé à la seule banque des îles située à Stanley, en face du magasin FIC West.
column3: Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands, which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store.

column1: English: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening. = French: En début de journée les vents soufflaient à environ 83 km/h, et ils devraient continuer à faiblir. ### English: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures. = French:
column2: Ne défigurez pas le site en marquant ou en grattant des graffitis sur les structures.
column3: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
